Info.title: How to Setup an Executable Python Script
Info.desc: Explains how to setup and run an executable Python script.

Instructions.instruction: Before you start understand the purpose of an executable. Executables encapsulate your script, the interpreter, and any dependencies into a single file. This means your code can run independently, regardless of whether Python is installed on the user's system. This can be beneficial when trying to transfer files.
